description.english: Defeat the Ice Titan
description.french: Vaincre le Titan de glace
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Titano di ghiaccio
description.spanish: Derrota al Titán de Hielo
description.brazilian: Derrote o Titã de Gelo

description.english: Get the Dark Gauntlet
description.german: Hol dir den Handschuh der Macht
description.french: Récupérer le gantelet de pouvoir
description.italian: Ottieni il Guanto d'arme oscuro
description.spanish: Consigue el Guantelete Oscuro
description.brazilian: Obtenha a luva Negra

description.english: Acquire the power of the first Dark Lord
description.german: Erlange die Macht des ersten Dunklen Fürsten
description.french: Acquérir le pouvoir du premier Seigneur Noir
description.italian: Acquisisci il potere del primo Signore Oscuro
description.spanish: Recupera el poder del primer Señor Oscuro
description.brazilian: Adquira o poder do primeiro Senhor das Trevas

description.english: Kill the Crow Witch
description.french: Tuer la sorcière corbeau
description.italian: Uccidi la Strega dei Corvi
description.spanish: Derrota a la Bruja de Cuervos
description.brazilian: Mate a Bruxa dos Corvos

description.english: Gain access to the Vampire Castle
description.french: Sauver le village Wygol de Brauner
description.italian: Entra nel castello dei Vampiri
description.spanish: Entra al Castillo de los Vampiros
description.brazilian: Obtenha acesso ao Castelo do Vampiro

description.english: Leave the Refectory with the Butcher's key
description.german: Verlasse das Refektorium mit dem Schlüssel des Metzlers
description.french: Quitter le réfectoire avec la clé du boucher
description.italian: Lascia il refettorio con la chiave del Macellaio
description.spanish: Usa la llave del Carnicero para abandorar el Refectorio
description.brazilian: Saia do Refeitório com a Chave do Carniceiro

description.english: Survive the encounter with Laura
description.french: Survivre à la rencontre avec Laura
description.italian: Sopravvivi all'incontro con Laura
description.spanish: Sobrevive al encuentro con Laura
description.brazilian: Sobreviva ao encontro com Laura

description.english: Acquire the power of the second Dark Lord
description.german: Erlange die Macht des zweiten Dunklen Fürsten
description.french: Acquérir le pouvoir du second Seigneur Noir
description.italian: Acquisisci il potere del secondo Signore Oscuro
description.spanish: Recupera el poder del segundo Señor Oscuro
description.brazilian: Adquira o poder do segundo Senhor das Trevas

description.english: Persuade Baba Yaga to open a portal to the Necromancer area
description.german: Überrede Baba Jaga, ein Portal zum Gebiet des Nekromanten zu öffnen
description.french: Persuader Baba Yaga d'ouvrir le portail de la région du nécronomancien
description.italian: Convinci Baba Yaga ad aprire un portale per la terra dei Negromanti
description.spanish: Convence a Baba Yaga para que te lleve a la tierra de los Nigromantes
description.brazilian: Convença a Baba Yaga a abrir um portal para a área do Necromante

description.english: Vanquish the Gravedigger
description.french: Vaincre le fossoyeur
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Becchino
description.spanish: Aniquila al Enterrador
description.brazilian: Vença o Coveiro em combate

description.english: Acquire the power of the third Dark Lord
description.german: Erlange die Macht des dritten Dunklen Fürsten
description.french: Acquérir le pouvoir du troisième Seigneur Noir
description.italian: Acquisisci il potere del terzo Signore Oscuro
description.spanish: Recupera el poder del tercer Señor Oscuro
description.brazilian: Adquira o poder do terceiro Senhor das Trevas

description.english: Defeat Satan and save the world
description.german: Besiege Satan und rette die Welt
description.french: Vaincre Satan et sauver le monde
description.italian: Sconfiggi Satana e salva il mondo
description.spanish: Derrota a Satán y salva el mundo
description.brazilian: Derrote o Satã e salve o mundo

description.english: Open portal to dimensional prison

description.brazilian: Derrote O Esquecido
